ca.ualberta.cs.shinyexpensetracker.test

Class DestinationListFragmentTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • ca.ualberta.cs.shinyexpensetracker.test.DestinationListFragmentTest

  • public class DestinationListFragmentTest
extends <any>
    Test for the DestinationListFragment. This fragment is responsible for displaying a list of destinations in the summary page.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Setup for each test.

      Test that deleting an existing destination removes it from the list view.

      Checks that destinations are visible in the list view.

      Check that editing the destination updates the list view.
      void testEditDestinationShowsActivity()
      Checks that tapping an item in the list view will open the appropriate activity for editing.
      void testFragViewsNotNothing()
      Checks that we can access views within the fragment.
      void testNewDestinationsAreAdded()
      Tests that adding new destinations update the interface.

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
           throws Exception
        Setup for each test. Creates a new claim and adds a destination. It then starts the activity with the intent of displaying info about this claim and selects the Destinations tab.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • testFragViewsNotNothing

        public void testFragViewsNotNothing()
        Checks that we can access views within the fragment. If this test fails, the fragment isn't being put into the activity correctly.

      • testEditDestinationShowsActivity

        public void testEditDestinationShowsActivity()
        Checks that tapping an item in the list view will open the appropriate activity for editing.

      • testDeleteDestination

        public void testDeleteDestination()
        Test that deleting an existing destination removes it from the list view.

      • testNewDestinationsAreAdded

        public void testNewDestinationsAreAdded()
        Tests that adding new destinations update the interface.

      • testDestinationListVisibility

        public void testDestinationListVisibility()
        Checks that destinations are visible in the list view.

      • testEditDestination

        public void testEditDestination()
        Check that editing the destination updates the list view.
